stadium.name: The Glowstone Terrace
stadium.description: A massive, opulent stadium built on one of the city's main terraces, carved directly into the mountainside. The field is famously paved with polished Glowstone, and the stands overlook the bustling Confluence Market and the ongoing construction of the Guild's Skyport.

stats.pregame_ritual: Doing a terrible, clumsy dance to 'loosen the joints'.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Arm-wrestling the player who plays the same position on their team.
Speaking only in rhymes for the hour before the game.
Rubbing the Trollball on their armpits for 'grip'.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Going over the game plan drawn in the dirt with the team captain.
Covering their forearms in a sticky tree sap for 'grip'.
Eating a dandelion, stem and all.
Headbutting their own team's goal post (gently).

stadium.name: The Unruly Yard
stadium.description: A field in the center of the city's most rebellious district. The stadium is covered in graffiti, the crowd is hostile, and riots are a common post-game (and mid-game) event.

stats.pregame_ritual: Drinking a shot of hot gravy from a dented tin cup.
Arranging their gear in a perfect, aesthetically pleasing spiral.
Testing the heft of their weapon with a series of slow, deliberate swings.
Kissing the Trollball on its stitched 'nose'.
Reviewing hand signals for secret plays.
Refusing to step on any lines on the field before the whistle blows.
Telling a terrible joke to the Trollball to 'loosen it up'.
Dipping their hands in a bucket of ice-cold well water.
Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Reciting a short, epic poem about a past victory.

preGame:
# üéôÔ∏è TUESDAY NIGHT TROLLBALL REPORT üéôÔ∏è

**"Good evening, sports fans, ghouls, and creatures of the deep! This is Nok the Corrupter, bringing you the play-by-play LIVE from the World's Spine!"** üìªüòà

Folks, we are high up in the mountains tonight at **The Glowstone Terrace**! It is opulent, it is shiny, and frankly, it smells too much like money and not enough like old blood for my taste, but we work with what we have! Tonight, the **Confluence Captains** play host to the visiting **New Monteforte Chaos Creatures**! It‚Äôs a battle between the Guild's finest mercenaries and the anarchists from the graffiti-covered streets of Monteforte!

I‚Äôve been watching the warm-ups, and let me tell you, the tension is thicker than a dwarf's skull! **Ladew Evelina** of the Captains is over there chugging raw eggs‚Äîshells included! *CRUNCH!* That is the kind of protein intake I like to see! Meanwhile, the Captains' **Carnahan Laud** is literally eating dandelions off the sidelines. Is the Guild of the Black Sky cutting the catering budget? Someone ask that penny-pinching Chairman Brennen Farno!

On the visitor's side, **Mouldon Earl** is hopping around like a cat on a hot tin roof, refusing to step on any of the field lines. Superstition? Madness? Who cares! As long as they step on their opponents' faces! The White Ravens might be busy playing with dirt and curses back home‚Äîhello to the lovely Dame Terra‚Äîbut tonight, these Chaos Creatures are here to tear down the establishment! 

So grab a cold drink, ignore the screams from the void, and **LET'S PLAY TROLLBALL!** üëπüèà
postGame:
# ü©∏ POST-GAME CARNAGE REPORT ü©∏

**"Holy Mackeral, what a slobberknocker! The stones of Confluence are slick with gore tonight, folks!"**

The final whistle has blown, and the **Confluence Captains** have defended their shiny terrace with a decisive **3 to 1** victory over the **New Monteforte Chaos Creatures**! But the score doesn't tell the whole story‚Äîthe infirmary is going to be busier than a necromancer on a battlefield tonight!

### üèÅ The First Half
The game started with a scramble! Both teams were testing the waters, throwing missed tackles left and right. But then, **Stephan Lisk**‚Äîarmed with a pollaxe and a dream‚Äîsnatched up that leather troll head. He charged down the field, dodging a tackle from Gabriele Klehm, and **SLAMMED** it into the end zone! **TOUCHDOWN CAPTAINS!** That's 1-0!

We saw some early brutality too! **Placido Kora** of the Creatures absolutely leveled **Ladew Evelina**, sending them off the field on a stretcher! And **Urata Oriana** decided two can play at that game, taking out **Behl Berstine** with a bone-shaking hit! That's the spirit! 

### üè• The Second Half Bloodbath
After a quick halftime heal-up, the violence turned up to eleven! **Vonni Geoff** of the Captains came out swinging‚Äîor rather, throwing! They launched a beauty of a shot from Away Field that sailed right through the goal! Two points! **3-0 Captains!**

Then, folks, the wheels came off the wagon and crashed right into the meat grinder! It was an absolute cascade of injuries! üöë
*   **Tucker Hett** snapped **Caves Cestar** like a twig!
*   **Belding Chloe** returned the favor and smashed **Boulanger Procto**!
*   **Behl Berstine** got revenge on **Tucker Hett**!
*   **Mouldon Earl** crushed **Ladew Evelina** (again!)!
*   **Deach Sharlene** put **Placido Kora** in the dirt!

I haven't seen this many broken bones since the last time Cyfnerth the Butcher hosted a barbecue! amidst the chaos, the Chaos Creatures finally showed some life. **Mouldon Earl**, despite their fear of lines, crossed the big one at the end of the field for a Dunk, putting Monteforte on the board! 

### üèÜ Final Thoughts
It ended **3-1**, a solid win for the Captains. The Guild of the Black Sky‚Äîled by door-loving Garon and the rest of those bureaucrats‚Äîtakes home the glory. But the real winners? Us! The fans of VIOLENCE! 

This is Nok the Corrupter, reminding you that if you didn't lose a tooth, you didn't play hard enough! **GOODNIGHT OSTERRA!** üåëüíÄ
